entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who looks around and interacts with Draco Malfoy. He is expected to see Malfoy but does not enjoy it.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a Slytherin student who smirks at Harry from between his cronies Crabbe and Goyle. He has been made a prefect and has the power to hand out punishments.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is one of Malfoy's cronies who stands next to him.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is another one of Malfoy's cronies who stands next to Crabbe.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who laughs at Malfoy's insults.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who tells Malfoy to shut up.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a friend of Harry's who laughs at Malfoy's insults.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a friend of Harry's who laughs at Malfoy's insults.

relationships.description: Harry and Draco Malfoy have an antagonistic relationship, as they frequently clash and insult each other.
Harry is friends with Ron, as evidenced by their laughter at Malfoy's insults.
Harry is also friends with Hermione, who tells Malfoy to shut up.
Ginny is another friend of Harry's who laughs at Malfoy's insults.
Neville is a friend of Harry's who also laughs at Malfoy's insults.
Draco Malfoy has a relationship with Crabbe, as they stand together and are described as cronies.
Malfoy also has a relationship with Goyle, another one of his cronies.
